query: Validate ISR safety for MacTCP code
expected_behavior: Detects callback functions by naming pattern (_asr, _notifier, _completion) or signatures
Scans for forbidden calls: malloc, memcpy, TickCount, printf, BlockMove, etc.
Reports violations with file path, line number, callback name, and forbidden function
Suggests correct ISR-safe pattern for each violation
Confirms code is ISR-safe if no violations found
